Subject: Cannot install updates
Description:
I cannot properly install EPP Server Hotfix #1.1
-The system installs the update, i get the patch applied successfully screen.
-The updates gets removed from the avaiable updates list
-If i press check for updates the update is listed as avaiable again
-I have installed it like 6 times, still the same problem.

+ Two old 2022 product updates are grayed out, only the cancel schedule prompt is avaiable. If i press the button the result is: The update cannot be cancelled because it has begun running.... but the updates wont install.
Solution_Comment__c: The issue with vulnerabilities got fixed meanwhile
